message: any Suggestion for free .net library handling SMS , I've tried http://www.nuget.org/packages/GSMComm/ but I think it's little bit outdated ...bad queuing ...and more then 64 character received in discrete messages
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: I'm talking about using shared USB Device
.NET library for sending SMSs from a phone connected to the machine via USB, did I understand that correctly?

Okay, I'm not an expert on this but I found this article
http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/20420/How-To-Send-and-Receive-SMS-using-GSM-Modem

I can't find a free library but it seems some libraries are available for purchase 
http://www.logixmobile.com/products/mcorelib/
http://www.logiccodesoft.com/lcgsmsmslib.aspx

If the phone/computer has a Data connection, you can use a hosted service to send SMS messages. Twilio is popular
http://www.twilio.com/sms
